recommendations.summary: The system shows no immediate security issues or compliance flags, but proactive measures are recommended for data quality and cost optimization.

recommendations.title: Establish GDPR/CCPA Compliance Framework
recommendations.description: Develop and implement a compliance framework to ensure adherence to GDPR and CCPA regulations, focusing on data handling and user privacy.
action_items: Conduct a data inventory to identify personal data and its usage.
Create a privacy policy that aligns with GDPR/CCPA requirements and communicate it to users.

recommendations.title: Regular Security Audits
recommendations.description: Although no security issues have been detected, establish a routine for conducting security audits to identify potential vulnerabilities proactively.
action_items: Implement a vulnerability management program to address any identified issues.

recommendations.title: Monitor and Optimize Job Costs
recommendations.description: Analyze job cost trends to identify opportunities for cost reduction and efficiency improvements.
action_items: Implement a cost monitoring dashboard to track job expenses.
Review and optimize job configurations to reduce unnecessary costs.

recommendations.title: Implement Data Quality Metrics
recommendations.description: Establish metrics and monitoring for data quality to ensure the integrity and reliability of data used in processes.
action_items: Define key data quality metrics (e.g., accuracy, completeness, consistency).
Set up automated data quality checks and alerts.

recommendations.title: Define and Monitor SLOs
recommendations.description: Establish Service Level Objectives (SLOs) to ensure performance standards are met and monitored effectively.
action_items: Define clear SLOs for key services.
Implement monitoring tools to track SLO adherence and report on performance.

alerts.message: No security vulnerabilities detected; maintain vigilance with regular audits.
No data quality metrics currently in place; establish monitoring to ensure data integrity.
No cost trends reported; implement cost monitoring to optimize resource usage.
No SLOs defined; establish and monitor SLOs for operational excellence.
